questions.question: What is the dominant color visually apparent on the exterior of this footwear?

Based on visual inspection, what is the overall shape of the footwear's toe cap?
Does the visible zipper appear to be functional, based on its visual appearance in the image?

What is the apparent texture of the leather, smooth or visibly textured?
Does the visible insole exhibit a noticeable pattern or design?
